mapper.select: SELECT room_no, company_id, room_nm, room_base_count, room_max_count, room_detail, room_img, room_normal_price, room_holiday_price, room_extra_price, room_reg_date FROM tb_room WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT rf.room_facility_no, rf.room_no, rf.facility_cd, f.facility_nm FROM tb_room_facility rf JOIN tb_facility f ON rf.facility_cd = f.facility_cd WHERE rf.room_no = #{roomNo}
